channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report E-2025020009
item.description:
Report E-2025020009

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-08T03:31:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-02
  • City: PETERSBURG
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: KAG SPECIALTY PRODUCTS GROUP, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 3510
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The KAG Specialty Products, LLC trailer was loaded with hypochlorite solution and was staged at the shipper location. The driver that arrived to pick up the trailer noticed that there was a slow leak from a flange on the trailer. Approximately 5 gallons of hypochlorite solution was released. First Call Environmental responded to the scene and handled the remediation.
